channel.title: Is this right?
channel.description:
I have recently made a server and tryed to start it.
now it says,
Starting testscapeserver on 0.0.0.0:43594
and ive been wating for about 3+ mins now
it hasnt started yet
do i have to change the 0.0.0.0 thing? if i do plz tell me how

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @Sinister-Scape Sinister-Scape
item.description:
@Sinister-Scape wrote:

the 0.0.0.0 thing is fine, it does it on mine and people can get on.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @yur_no_prob yur no prob
item.description:
@yur_no_prob wrote:

It is 0.0.0.0 but i cant even log into it. I doubt other people can[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 10:22:37 PM[/size][hr]plz help me until i can get it :o?

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @Mod.Ash Mod.Ash
item.description:
@Mod.Ash wrote:

Ok… when that black box is up put in ur ip as 0.0.0.0 for other people to connect

or if only you want to connect put in 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
